title: Day 1: Flight from KUL - HND D7 552

items.title: Arrive at HND Airport
items.description: Perform Immigration Check and Fresh up, Jamak Prayer
items.note: Early check-in available for additional fee

items.title: Arrive at HND Airport
items.description: Check in to your hotel and freshen up
items.note: Early check-in available for additional fee

items.title: Explore Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden
items.description: Visit the beautiful Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden, a peaceful oasis in the heart of Tokyo
items.note: Best time to visit during cherry blossom season

items.title: Senso-ji Temple
items.description: Visit Tokyo's oldest and most significant Buddhist temple
items.note: Try the traditional fortune-telling (omikuji) for 100 yen

items.title: Tokyo Skytree
items.description: Experience panoramic views of Tokyo from one of the world's tallest towers
items.note: Book tickets online for better prices

items.title: Tsukiji Outer Market
items.description: Explore the famous outer market with its fresh seafood and local delicacies
items.note: Best to visit early morning for fresh seafood
